tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"折跃箭","italic": false}',Lore:['[{"text":"令你","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"折跃","underlined": true},"到箭矢的落点。",{"text":"（传送并重置摔落，","color":"dark_gray"}]','{"text":"若射中平台边缘则会传送至平台上方）","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}','[{"text":"顺带为弓附加低等级","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"冲击","underlined": true},"。",{"text":"（提高击退距离）","color":"dark_gray"}]','""','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"15 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":"      ⚜ 储存  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"1 支","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"❤ 伤害  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"9 - 16.5（满弦）","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
